data.actual_result: The message starts bugging around and you can't scroll easily.
data.expected_result: It should scroll up slowly and steady.
data.short_description: Scrolling in editing of a message with 3+ lines and an emoji android 7.0+
data.steps_to_repro: - go to a channel - you must have android 7.0 and above - type a message (start the message with an emoji, but not a system emoji) - add 3 lines or more of text below the emoji - send the message - try to edit the message - start scrolling up really slowly.
